column1: Smoque BBQ////The real kicker was when my plate of ribs came out
column2: they apologized for the half slab turning out a little small. Â I hadn't said a word or complained
column3: or even noticed for that matter
column4: but they gave me a whole new half slab for free. I ended up with a whole slab of yummy ribs
column5: and everyone I was with was stunned at the service.
